Attributes.description: Tendencies toward equality and inequality; manifestations of inequality (occupation, education, gender, ethnicity, income, power) and their consequences; caste and class features of major stratification systems; theories of social class; stratification profile of contemporary industrial societies.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of SOCI 100, SOCI 101, SOCI 102.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 16:00, End Time: 17:30, Building: Buchanan, Room: D312
